name: Nature Defense
description:
Game made in 8h+ for a college project.

Made by: 

(me) Lucas Mattos - 3D assets, 3D Animation and programming

(GelaPT - itch.io) André Monteiro - Programming

Other assets by: Kenney • Home

You have to survive the waves of enemies by getting resources from trees and rocks to buy turrets and place them in the world. The zombie plants come at night, so be sure to get prepared on this only nature survival!

Use 1, 2 and 3 to change the tool you're holding.

Use Left Mouse to chop down trees and break rocks.

Use E to collect the resources from the ground.

Press TAB to open the crafting menu and buy the turrets. Then press the Left Mouse to place them in the world.

Press ESC to open a menu to change the sensivity.
